sections.heading: Payment on disability or death of holder in his own right of account6-433
sections.text: Payment on disability or death of holder in his own right of accountA. If the holder in his own right of an account becomes a person with a disability and a conservator has been appointed, by a court of competent jurisdiction,

sections.heading: on disability or death of holder in his own right of account
